name: CheckFORMULA
description: This plugin got a 4ml file with constraints and it will send them in a POST request to a preconfigured FORMULA machine for chekcing.

configStructure.name: formulaModule
configStructure.description: A Formula module that contains the generated domains and the user defined constraints as well

configStructure.name: formulaMachine
configStructure.displayName: Access URL to the Formula machine
configStructure.description: A URL that point to the formula machine where the checking can be done.

configStructure.name: constraints
configStructure.regexMessage: The text should be a space separated list of strings
configStructure.description: Which user defined constraints should be checked.
